\begin{abstract}
Use series to
approximate the values
with an
error of magnitude
less than $10^{-8}$.
\begin{equation}\label{eqn:problem}
	\textbf{19.}\quad \int_{0}^{0.1} 
	\frac{sinx}{x}\ dx
\end{equation}

\noindent\textbf{\\}

\end{abstract}%
